figure.alt: Your roadmap should be a sequence of problems you want to solve, not features. Your success metrics should be agreed upon while you are defining the problem, not the solution.

node.excerpt: Always helpful to be reminded of this point. Instead of continuously building features for those who shout loudest, we need to focus on the problems our users face and then identify how we'll solve
